note: Configuration and dataset for the birefringence_tomography module. This file ships with published CMB cosmic birefringence (global rotation) angle constraints. For publication-grade work, extend with a documented likelihood model (correlations/systematics) and additional tomographic points once vetted multi-z constraints are available.

tfpt_prior.note: Placeholder TFPT prior for the step location/width (z_c, w). Until a ladder/holonomy mechanism fixes a physical z_c, treat this as a *structured hypothesis* rather than a derivation.
